last_episode_to_air.name: Time Out of Mind
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dylan secretly meets with an important lead that has info on her father’s disappearance, while London and Seth deal with their relationship issues, and Hud faces a tough choice in the wake of his bad decisions.

name: Open Heart
overview: In the wake of her father's disappearance, 16-year-old Dylan Blake falls in with the wrong crowd, gets arrested, and earns court-ordered community service volunteering at Open Heart Memorial, the hospital where her mother and sister are doctors, where her grandparents are board members and benefactors and where her father was last seen the day he vanished.

episodes.name: Last Things First (1)
episodes.overview: Dylan Blake starts community service at Open Heart Memorial. She begins a covert investigation into her dad’s disappearance and tries to get her hands on hospital security footage from the day he disappeared. Meanwhile, Dylan’s sister London Blake struggles with the pressure her mother, Dr. Jane Blake, puts on her at work.

episodes.name: Last Thing First (2)
episodes.overview: Dylan Blake starts community service at Open Heart Memorial. She begins a covert investigation into her dad’s disappearance and tries to get her hands on hospital security footage from the day he disappeared. Meanwhile, Dylan’s sister London Blake struggles with the pressure her mother, Dr. Jane Blake, puts on her at work.

episodes.name: Unknown Soldier
episodes.overview: Dylan confronts Hud; London tries to balance her work and personal lives; Jane plans to tell her daughters about her relationship with Dr. K.

episodes.name: Private Eyes
episodes.overview: Dylan and Wes investigate a note hidden in Richard's watch; London treats a prying patient.

episodes.name: In Plain Sight
episodes.overview: Dylan's revelation brings in London; Hud and Scarlet's relationship takes a sharp turn.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: Dylan follows clues to Richard's hiding spot; London wants a new resident advisor.

episodes.name: Connected
episodes.overview: Dylan stakes out what she thinks is her dad's loft; London wants Seth to discuss his family.

episodes.name: Ancient History
episodes.overview: Dylan stakes out what she believes to be her dad’s loft, while London tries to get Seth to open up about his family, and Wes’s attempt at humour lands him in trouble with Edward.

episodes.name: Password
episodes.overview: Dylan and Mikayla follow up on the mysterious note they received, while London is put in charge of Scarlet and Hud, and Wes's uncle adds extra stress to his recovery.

episodes.name: Paying for It
episodes.overview: Dylan meets with a mystery caller claiming to have information about Richard, while Hud forms an unexpected connection, and Dr. K’s relationship is tested by Goodis.

episodes.name: Trust Fund
episodes.overview: Dylan tries to get her hands on money by any means possible, while London oversteps with Seth’s family, and Wes forms a strong bond with Edward.

episodes.name: Time Out of Mind
episodes.overview: Dylan secretly meets with an important lead that has info on her father’s disappearance, while London and Seth deal with their relationship issues, and Hud faces a tough choice in the wake of his bad decisions.
